name: react-geolookup
description: A React autosuggest / lookup component that can utilize the Google Maps Places API, Open Street Maps Nominatim service, or a custom Geocoding service.
author: Mark Lewis <mark.lewis@sourcefabric.org>

scripts.test: nyc --include 'src/*' -e .jsx -s npm run unit-test && npm run report
scripts.server: npm run prepare:example && light-server -s example/dist -p 8000 -w 'src/*.jsx,src/*.js,example/src/*.js # npm run js:example' -w 'src/*.css,example/src/*.css # npm run css # reloadcss' -w 'example/src/*.html # npm run copy:assets # reload'
scripts.prepare:example: rm -rf example/dist && mkdir example/dist && npm run copy:assets && npm run js:example && npm run css
scripts.js:example: browserify example/src/app.js -t babelify --extension=.jsx> example/dist/app.js && browserify example/src/app-nominatim.js -t babelify --extension=.jsx> example/dist/app-nominatim.js && browserify example/src/app-geocode-provider.js -t babelify --extension=.jsx> example/dist/app-geocode-provider.js
scripts.js:example:uglify: uglifyjs example/dist/app.js -o example/dist/app.js -c warnings=false --mangle && uglifyjs example/dist/app-nominatim.js -o example/dist/app-nominatim.js -c warnings=false --mangle && uglifyjs example/dist/app-geocode-provider.js -o example/dist/app-geocode-provider.js -c warnings=false --mangle
scripts.js:browser: browserify src/Geolookup.jsx --standalone Geolookup --exclude react -t babelify --extension=.jsx -t browserify-global-shim > dist/react-geolookup.js
scripts.build:dist: babel src --out-dir dist && cp src/geolookup.css dist/
scripts.build:browser: npm run js:browser && npm run js:browser:uglify
scripts.build:example: npm run prepare:example && npm run js:example:uglify
scripts.release:patch: npm run build:browser && bumpery --verify='npm test' --no-push --no-commit --no-createTag --versionType patch && npm run release:finish
scripts.release:minor: npm run build:browser && bumpery --verify='npm test' --no-push --no-commit --no-createTag --versionType minor && npm run release:finish
scripts.release:major: npm run build:browser && bumpery --verify='npm test' --no-push --no-commit --no-createTag --versionType major && npm run release:finish
scripts.release:finish: npm run changelog && npm run release:commit && npm run publish:example
